item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Tauranga, South Auckland, Otara, Mt Maunganui, Manurewa, Mangere, Bay of Plenty, Auckland news, Bay of Plenty Times, Coronavirus, Diseases, National
item.title: Live: 'Test immediately' - businesses outside of Auckland linked to Covid case
item.description:
A bakery and a petrol station outside of Auckland have been linked to a person with Covid-19 - the first time businesses outside of the city have been linked to the current outbreak in weeks.
The Uppercrust ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202138/uppercrustsep17_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The Uppercrust Bakery in Mt Maunganui has been linked to a Covid case twice this past week. Image / Google

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202138/manuroasep17_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The Manuroa Superette at 1/15 Princess St, Takanini, was visited by a person with Covid on Monday between 1.41pm and 2.45pm. Image / Google

item.title: Timaru tragedy: Three dead, one in hospital - neighbour heard a bang, sobbing, moaning
item.description:
A neighbour heard a bang and then the sounds of sobbing and moaning at a Timaru house where three people were found dead.
Police have launched a homicide investigation after finding three people dead ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202138/A02I34641_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The police forensic team have arrived at the property and a scene examination will get underway soon. Photo / George Heard

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202138/A02I3477_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A neighbour heard a bang and then the sounds of sobbing and moaning at a Timaru house where three people were found dead. Photo / George Heard

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202138/policecar2_70x73.png?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Police have launched a homicide investigation after finding three people dead at a residential address in Timaru overnight. Photo / NZH
